title: Really riot ? REALLY?
body:
Alrighty. So could you guys tell me without biased feelings if this deserves a 14 day ban ? (First offense on my acc)



Game 1
Hentai me down: .
Hentai me down: you're fault
Hentai me down: not mine
Hentai me down: vayne jg with no keystone
Hentai me down: whata re you thinking
Hentai me down: you can't play vayne without a keystonef
Hentai me down: LOL.
Hentai me down: ez game
Hentai me down: unless you get hand fed you can't win as vayne without a keystone
Hentai me down: unlucky match up i guess
Hentai me down: im 23
Hentai me down: ????????
Hentai me down: you cant xd
Hentai me down: if you p2w then yes
Hentai me down: not p2w
Hentai me down: but like put money for champs
Hentai me down: wich imo is fucking retarded but ok
Hentai me down: xd
Hentai me down: ?
Hentai me down: do you know what a 144hz is ?
Hentai me down: suprisec
Hentai me down: the fact that you can formulate phrases with such a low iq suprises me
Hentai me down: but ok
Hentai me down: . xd
Hentai me down: you would've muted me from the second i talked to you then
Hentai me down: but you were 1/0...
Hentai me down: yes?
Hentai me down: .
Hentai me down: skills>keystones
Hentai me down: 13/28 ?
Hentai me down: ofc you got no keystones
Hentai me down: you're fault
Hentai me down: hmm
Hentai me down: thats what i ment by low iq
Hentai me down: ?
Hentai me down: trash
Hentai me down: i mean
Hentai me down: want to 1 vs 1 ? i won't use a keystone
Hentai me down: any champ
Hentai me down: :")
Hentai me down: xd
Hentai me down: naut you watched me die
Hentai me down: hello ?
Hentai me down: .
Hentai me down: theres a reason 3/4 of challengers top laners main jayce
Hentai me down: its fucking simple to play
Hentai me down: yeye ofc
Hentai me down: xd
Hentai me down: im, not ?
Hentai me down: if you deem thisd toxic
Hentai me down: stop playing
Hentai me down: rn
Hentai me down: you won't like it when you get high elo
Hentai me down: gg
Hentai me down: was fun
Hentai me down: want to 1 vs 1 ?
Hentai me down: or na

replies.body:
Circles have neither a beginning nor an end; this post is not a circle: it had a beginning and now too an end.

If you have any questions about this moderation, feel free to reach out to us in the [Boards Discord](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification) or [Discuss the Boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation).

Stepping into the game with negative mentality isn't a good start. Never sulk in the misfortune you're in, make the most out of what you have. 
If vayne doesn't have a keystone, then she doesn't have a keystone. If she offers nothing, so be it. Do what you can and avoid doing what you can't.

Passive aggression leading to straight up insults pretty much validates the toxicity. This has clearly stepped over the line. With riot's standard this might've warranted 25 game chat restriction instead, but 2 week ban isn't unreasonable. I can't give you my opinion, because my standard (while I disagree) is considered too high objectively.

Irrelevant side note, you're playing a team game, where acting cooperatively is highly valued, yet you seem to value satisfaction through voicing your opinion over an encouraging atmosphere to bring out the team's maximum potential, and even asking to 1v1 in a game where you're not supposed to 1v1 in.  I know you like this game, but I feel like it doesn't suit you.
she was in the enemy team.Everyone was toxic. xd

Needlessly rude and immature, but i would expect a 14-game chat restriction for a first offense, not a 14 day ban.

As a tip, "1v1 me" is the classic way of saying "i am a 15 year old brat and i am MAAAAAAD SRS BSNS". It ensures nobody is going to do anything more than laugh their ass off at you.
I can't disagree with the whole 1 vs 1 thing but i said that because the guy challenged me.But then again I should just mute him.Lesson learned.
It was probably 'retarded' that got you. It's not really a slur, but it's generally not a word you should be using all the same.
i didn't say she was retarded.I said the idea of buying champs with rp is retarded.
Entirely irrelevant. The automated system say you used 'retarded' and took action.

First offense: 10 game chat restriction
Second offense: 25 game chat restriction
Third offense: 2 week ban
Fourth offense: Permanent ban

WAS I REALLY TOXIC ENOUGH TO SKIP 2 CHAT RESTRICTIONS ? Dam.I mean i got problems of my own but that system riot....
To skip? Definitely not.

> [{quoted}](name=Hentai me down,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=vkuVXp7W,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-09-29T02:16:02.086+0000)
>
> Alrighty. So could you guys tell me without biased feelings if this deserves a 14 day ban ? (First offense on my acc)
> 
> 
> 
> Game 1
> Hentai me down: .
> Hentai me down: you're fault

Your*
Really man, I am a bit of a grammar freak, but I won't get pissed at someone for doing something incorrectly in a game chat.
I think " retarded" is starting to get on Riot's list of stuff they don't want to see, period.

Still seems pretty harsh for a pre-level 30 penalty

I would submit a ticket to Riot Support.

You should had gotten a chat ban, since I don't see any common phrases that would skip tiers like "k.y.s" or anything racist or homophobic.

Unless there was a second game, this isn't 14 day ban worthy.

Edit: Because K.y.s got censored.

bruh the worst part about all of this is that i added the guy that reported me (or i think) and we played a game together afterwards HES IN MY FUCKING FRIEND LIST ! xd I was just really confused.If i could get it unbanned that'd be great tho !

Thats weird that he's on your friendlist but hey man its your friendlist who am I to judge. 

But yeah man submit a ticket, first response should be automated but after a few other responses you should get a "Human" response. 

If this is all the chatlogs show, then its seems preharsh for a Pre-30 ban and you probably hit a trigger word or something because its all automated, even feeding bans now.

Usually support is fine about cases like this because they know the automated system is garbage (Submitted something on reddit about it).

Like I Said earlier, you should be chatbanned not banned so they may change it to a chatban.

Only the first response from the blitz bot is automated.

The rest of the responses are copy and paste responses.
Hes actually a cool guy xd this game fucks with my emotions.Next game EVVERYONE IS FUCKING MUTED.
Sounds like a plan man
Actually, that doesn't seem toxic ENOUGH for a 14 day ban, still pretty toxic, I've done much worse and not have penalties.

You were morally in the right for calling out the fact that Vayne was explicitly Playing to Lose by not taking a keystone and she probably deserves a ban much more than you do.

I don't think _anyone_  should ever get banned in any game for what they post in chat if that same chat also has a mute.
